title: Embrujo de Granada
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, Italian, Japanese, Organic, Asian, European, Fusion, Spanish
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian restaurant serves seasonal cuisine made from local farmers, some of which is organic. Located in a former house palace in the center of the city. A quiet atmosphere with different spaces and a vintage decor. Offers meals, soda, beer and desserts, in addition to a wide selection of teas, coffees and drinks.
